about_the_game:
Game Title: Planetarian

Story Overview:

Immerse yourself in the enchanting universe of Planetarian, where you take on the role of the guardian of the World Tree. This mystical entity governs multiple planets, and its well-being is paramount to the survival of these worlds. As the Planetarian, your mission is to protect the World Tree from malevolent forces that seek to disrupt the balance of the cosmos. Embark on an epic journey, battling formidable foes and navigating through diverse and treacherous terrains. The fate of these worlds rests on your shoulders, and every decision you make will shape their future.

Game Features:

  • Third-Person Shooter: Experience intense combat from a third-person perspective, controlling the Planetarian as you take on a variety of enemies in dynamic and action-packed battles.

  • Bullet Hell Elements: Brace yourself for chaotic and exhilarating battles, where you'll face relentless barrages of bullets and lasers. Precision and agility are key to surviving these frenetic encounters.

  • Diverse Environments: Explore a vast array of rugged and visually stunning landscapes, each with its own unique charm. From harsh deserts to lush forests, every planet offers a new and captivating environment to discover.

  • Seven Unique Planets: Engage in ever-changing and unpredictable battles across seven distinct planets. Each planet presents its own set of challenges, enemies, and environmental hazards, ensuring that no two battles are ever the same.

  • Varied Enemies: Face off against a wide array of enemies, each influenced by their planetary environments. From grotesque, otherworldly creatures to high-tech sci-fi adversaries, the diversity of foes will keep you on your toes.

  • Item Collection and Upgrades: Collect an assortment of equipment and weaponry imbued with the energy of the planets. Each item offers unique stat-boosting effects, allowing you to customize your abilities and enhance your combat effectiveness. Gather powerful gear and weapons to prepare yourself for the challenges ahead.

Support Features:

  • PC and Graphics Card Support: Planetarian offers extensive support for various PC setups and graphics cards, ensuring smooth and responsive gameplay. Utilize the precision of mouse and keyboard controls to navigate and conquer the game's challenges.

  • Immersive 3D Audio: Dive into the game's rich audio landscape with spatial 3D audio, which enhances the realism and intensity of your experience. The immersive sound design brings every battle and environment to life.

  • Extensive Customization Options: Tailor your gameplay experience with a wide range of graphics and accessibility options. Whether you're optimizing performance or adjusting settings for comfort, Planetarian offers a customizable experience to suit your preferences.

  • Controller Support: Enjoy the flexibility of playing with various controllers, including PS controllers. Find the control scheme that best suits your playstyle and immerse yourself in the action.

  • Single-Player Focus: Planetarian is designed for a focused single-player experience. Please note that cross-play and multiplayer modes are not supported, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story and gameplay without distractions.

Story Overview:

Immerse yourself in the enchanting universe of Planetarian, where you take on the role of the guardian of the World Tree. This mystical entity governs multiple planets, and its well-being is paramount to the survival of these worlds. name: Planetarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join the Planetarian, guardian of the World Tree, on an epic journey to protect various planets. Experience intense third-person shooter gameplay with bullet hell elements. Battle diverse enemies across seven visually stunning planets and collect equipment infused with planetary energy.
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Hungarian, Galician, Gujarati, K'iche', Nepali, Dari, Latvian, Luxembourgish, Lithuanian, Marathi, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Mongolian, Basque, Valencian, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Serbian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Armenian, Assamese, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Estonian, Odia, Yoruba, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Uyghur, Wolof, Igbo, Georgian, Zulu, Cherokee, Tswana, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Croatian, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Tamil, Tajik, Tatar, Telugu, Turkmen, Tigrinya, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Filipino, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi
